snippet: If the first day of the Buffalo Bills' rookie camp is any indication, coach Rex Ryan's larger-than-life personality has already rubbed off on many of the newcomers....
lead_paragraph: If the first day of the Buffalo Bills' rookie camp is any indication, coach Rex Ryan's larger-than-life personality has already rubbed off on many of the newcomers.

headline.main: Buffalo Bills Rookie Class Displays Rex-Like Exuberance
headline.print_headline: Buffalo Bills Rookie Class Displays Rex-Like Exuberance
